name: Samoan Green Banana
author: Goddess
summary: This is a side dish most Polynesians love to eat with their main dish. Here in America, it's made with green bananas. Serve with Samoan palusami, teriyaki chicken, or steak. Enjoy!
directions: Combine the coconut milk and onion in a bowl; set aside
Bring a large pot of water to a boil over medium heat
Boil the bananas in their skin for 30 to 40 minutes; drain
Run the bananas under cold water until they are cool enough to handle
Remove the bananas whole from their skins
Heat a large saucepan over medium-high heat
Place the bananas in the pan
Pour the coconut milk mixture over the bananas
Cook until the coconut milk is foamy
Allow to cool 5 minutes before serving
